Title: 035: Build Your Own Data Science Masters Degree with David Venturi
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with Data Science Course Critic David Venturi. You will hear about a data-driven approach to building a masters degree in data science, learn about the alternative strategies necessary to secure employment and get some essential study hacks you would love to know.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/35
